data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be windy over the region. The easterly airstream will moderate slightly on Friday. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, temperatures will fall slightly over the coastal areas of southern China during the weekend and early next week. It is expected that an area of low pressure over the western North Pacific, east of the Philippines will bring unsettled weather to the region in the latter part of this week, and edge closer to the vicinity of the Philippines in the middle part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251029","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning and at night.
